tasks.title: Implement Login Page
tasks.description: Create the login page with a form to authenticate users using Firebase.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter their credentials and log in.
JWT is stored in local storage upon successful login.
User is redirected to the dashboard page after login.

tasks.title: Implement Dashboard Page
tasks.description: Create the dashboard page to display a list of projects.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays a list of projects.
Each project is displayed as a card with its name, description, and creation date.
User can click on a project card to navigate to the project detail page.

tasks.title: Implement Upload Page
tasks.description: Create the upload page to allow users to upload a single file.
acceptance_criteria: User can select a file to upload.
A progress bar is displayed during the upload.
A new project is created upon successful upload.
User is redirected to the project detail page after the upload is complete.

tasks.title: Implement Project Detail Page
tasks.description: Create the project detail page to display the file list, code viewer, and chat area.
acceptance_criteria: Project detail page displays the file list.
User can click on a file to view its content in the code viewer.
Chat area is displayed and connected to the WebSocket.

tasks.title: Implement Job Status Polling
tasks.description: Implement a mechanism to poll the job status endpoint and update the UI accordingly.
acceptance_criteria: Job status is polled every 5 seconds.
UI is updated with the latest job status.
Polling stops when the job is completed or fails.

tasks.title: Implement Analysis Result View
tasks.description: Create a component to display the analysis result.
acceptance_criteria: Analysis result is displayed in a user-friendly format.
Findings are highlighted in the code viewer.
